channel.title: Cmd help
channel.description:
THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY DOUBLE-CLICK THE "JARMaker.jar" TO RUN IT - Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/)
[code]C:\Documents and Settings\Jackson\Desktop\JAR Maker>java -jar JARMaker.jar 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . [/code]
when i open it this comes up and this comes up when i type commands in cmd
THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY DOUBLE-CLICK THE "JARMaker.jar" TO RUN IT - Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/)
[code]C:\Documents and Settings\Jackson\Desktop\JAR Maker>java -jar JARMaker.jar 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
how can i fix this....

item.title: Cmd help
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

You need to set your environmental variable path for Java. You can get help on this Here.

Read full topic
